AspectLibrary.Name: Metalama.Patterns.Contracts
AspectLibrary.Author: PostSharp Technologies
AspectLibrary.Summary: Metalama Contracts implements three fundamental concepts of contract-based programming: preconditions, postconditions, and type invariants.

Aspect.Name: NotNull
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned a non-null value.

Aspect.Name: NotEmpty
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned a non-empty string or collection.

Aspect.Name: Required
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned non null value, and if the type is a string, a non empty string.

Aspect.Name: CreditCard
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned a valid credit card number.

Aspect.Name: Email
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned a valid e-mail address.

Aspect.Name: Phone
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned a valid phone number.

Aspect.Name: Url
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned a URL.

Aspect.Name: EnumDataType
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned a valid value for a given enum type.

Aspect.Name: GreaterThan
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned a value greater than a given minimum.

Aspect.Name: LessThan
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned a value smaller than a given minimum.

Aspect.Name: Negative
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned a negative value.

Aspect.Name: Range
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned a value within a given range.

Aspect.Name: RegularExpression
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned a string that matches a given regular expression.

Aspect.Name: StringLength
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned a string of expected length.

Aspect.Name: Invariant
Aspect.Description: Executes an invariant-checking method after each public or internal method of a class.

Aspect.Name: SuspendInvariants
Aspect.Description: Suspends the enforcement of invariants when the target method is executing.

Aspect.Name: VerifyNotNullableDeclarations
Aspect.Description: Automatically adds the [NotNull] contract to all non-nullable fields, properties and parameters of the public API, and reports a warning when the [NotNull] contract has been added manually because this is redundant.
